channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: 3 drains in a row all blocked - have been for months, 27th January
item.description:
Just after Henley Bank Lane, down to the entrance to Mill Lane, on the Shurdington Road, there are 3 of the 4 drains that are blocked, if you're travelling towards the Shell Garage/Stroud direction.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Shurdington Road, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole, 27th January
Pothole, 27th January
Potholes, 27th January
Water coming out out of road, 27th January
item.description:
Water is pouring out out of this repaired pothole and running down the street. Obviously very rainy last night. , but this isn’t a drain. It’s a hole in the road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Leckhampton Hill, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 35cm pothole, sharp edges, close to driveway entrance to 196 Leckhampton Road, 27th January
item.description:
Chatsworth Drive close to driveway into 196 Leckhampton Road. Has been there since Dec 25. Recent frosts have worsened & enlarged it causing more break up of the surface.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 196, Leckhampton Road, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The Swindon Lane problem - potholes full of water., 27th January
item.description:
Swindon Lane from race course round-a-bout to Tommy Taylor lane. This has become a dangerous stretch of road, particularly for cyclists. There are potholes full of water and much surface water running down the road. This is an accident waiting to happen. Thank you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 22, Swindon Lane, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerous parking on lines restrictions, 27th January
item.description:
Cars and van regularly parked outside property on restriction lines too close to a junction, opposite school entrance zigzag zags, next to school children’s crossing area. Reduces visibility, causes people to drive on pavements, increases congestion and is a safety risk for children crossing to school. Ongoing, daily, cars owned by the property they are parked outside and are there all day.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brookfield Road, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pavement not reinstated, 27th January
item.description:
Previous tarmac pavement now hardcover, new crossing not complete and raised kerbs trip hazard

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Innsworth Lane, Innsworth, Gloucester

item.title: Reinstatement sinking outside old farm house, 27th January
item.description:
Reinstatement sinking reporting again as not addressed Reported via Android in the Poor repairs (reinstatement) category anonymously at 09:52, Tue 19 August 2025 Sent to Gloucestershire County Council less than a minute later. FixMyStreet ref: 8044331.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Innsworth Lane, Innsworth, Tewkesbury

item.title: RTPI half working, 27th January
